metadataAttributes.Title: Data Analysis and Visualization with Microsoft Power BI
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Meet the growing demand for data analysis and visualization professionals by gaining the Power BI skills that top companies want.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Data Visualization Design, Advanced Data Visualizations, Data Visualization, DAX, Data Transformation, Data Extraction, Power BI Report Customization, Power BI Report Design, Power BI Calculated Columns and Measures, Power Query, Business Reporting Fluency, Relational Data Models, Stakeholder Management
